title: CBA, Franchise Tag, Melvin Gordon buzz with Jason La Canfora (Football 7/16)
description:
Will Brinson and CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora break down the latest news and notes from the NFL, including who might get a deal ahead of the franchise tag deadline (FYI: the show was recorded before Grady Jarrett's contract), what the future CBA negotiations hold and how Melvin Gordon's deal could shake out, plus other potential holdouts around the NFL.
